Title: Pilot Pirx's Inquest
Writer: Stanislaw Lem (short story), Marek Piestrak (adaptation), Vladimir Valutskiy
Actors: Sergei Desnitsky, Boleslaw Abart, Vladimir Ivashov, Aleksandr Kaydanovskiy
Plot: The movie is about "finite nonlinears," robots that closely resemble human beings but are even more perfect than humans. They are intended to eventually replace human beings in space ...
